//Restricted// 
NO.CAS-8(4)2009/DIV.I (Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :  01 /02//2011 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 08 /2011 
 
Subject : ACCESS OF VEHICLE IN RESPECT OF SHRI K.ROSAIAH(MLC),     
                FORMER CHIEF MINISTER, ANDHRA PRADESH UPTO THE  
                TARMAC AT HYDERABAD AIRPORT ONLY ON MEDICAL  
                GROUND.  
 
 
 
 In continuation to BCAS Circular No.36/2005 dated 30/08/2005,  Shri K 
Rosaiah (MLC), Former Chief Minister, Andhra Pradesh  is permitted to avail the 
facility of his own vehicle to and from aircraft during arrival and departure at  
Hyderabad airport only.  
 
 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security(CA). 
 
 
 
 
( R.N.Dhoke, IPS ) 
Addl.Commissioner of Security(CA) 
 
 
Distribution : As per list attached.  
 
Copy to :- 
 
MCA ( Shri S Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary ) : w.r.t MCA  letter 
No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS dated 03/01/2011.
